roleset.name: put into action or motion
roleset.note: ACTUATE-V NOTES: Member of VN class engender-27.1-1, comparison with 'activate.'. Frame By Claire (from actuate.01-v)

role.descr: entity set into action or motion

example.name: actuate-v: Active
example.text: [The star]-1 was close enough *PRO*-1 to actuate deceleration.

example.name: actuate-v: Sentential Complement
example.text: He was void of any of these feelings which-1 *-1 actuate men to do good.
